content: raspberry cow about pattern this is one of my series of my cow patterns the cow is made in white with color corresponding spots to the theme in this case pink the pattern also comes with a pattern for overalls and a mini fruit to go with the cow please do not sell distribute or duplicate this pattern in any shape or form you may sell the finished make but please credit me sunny stitches as the pattern designer materials abbreviations -white yarn single_crochet single_crochet -purple yarn chain chain magic_ring magic_ring -green yarn st stitch -5mm crochet hook increase increase 2 sts in each st -stitch markers decrease decrease single_crochet 2 sts together -polyfill stuffing fo fasten_off -needle for sewing half_double_crochet half_double_crochet -scissors slip_stitch slip_stitch -14mm eyes blo back loop only -small buttons optional head in white face spot in pink 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 2 6inc 12 2 6inc 12 3 single_crochet increase x6 18 3 single_crochet increase x6 18 4 2sc increase x6 24 4 2hdc increase 4sl st 4sc increase 5 3sc increase x6 30 2sl st 2hdc increase 4sl st 26 6 4sc increase x6 36 5 4hdc increase 4sl st 8sc 2sl 7 5sc increase x6 42 st 4sc 4sl st 30 8 6sc increase x6 48 sew onto head between 9-17 48sc 48 row 7 and 17 attach eye in 18 6sc decrease x6 42 row 1 and push all the way 19 5sc decrease x6 30 through head 20 4sc decrease 24 21 3sc decrease x6 18 22 2sc decrease x6 12 stuff if attaching safety eyes don t stuff until after sewing on face spot as it will make them easier to attach fo and leave tail long enough for sewing attach eyes bewttwen row 13-14 with 15sts apart if making face spot one eye will go through the face spot and then into the head to attach nose pink body white 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 2 6inc 12 2 6inc 12 3 single_crochet increase x6 18 3 single_crochet increase x6 18 4 2sc increase x6 24 4 2sc increase x6 24 5-7 24sc 24 fo and leave tail long enough for sewing sew 5 3sc increase x6 30 onto head between row 13-14 to 20 6 4sc increase x6 36 7 5sc increase x6 42 ears x2 pink 8-22 42sc 42 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 23 5sc decrease x6 36 2 6inc 12 3-7 12sc 12 24 4sc decrease x6 30 8 6dec 6 25 3sc decrease x6 24 do not stuff fo and leave a tail long enough 26 2sc decrease x6 18 for sewing stuff fo and leave tail long body spots pink to sew in the tail from the make as many as you like head will be used to attach the head to the body at row 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 22 head and row 26 body 2 6inc 12 3 single_crochet increase
